name: Mulpy
description:
The Game aims to provide a 2D multiplayer experience for gamers who want to play shooters online. The game is far from complete; however, we plan to add lots of new features in future updates. However, you can enjoy the sneak peek and please don't hesitate to share your experience.

Controls

A, D , S, W                    ----------   To   ----------        Move.

Right  Mouse Click  ---------- To ----------        FIRE.
